SELECT substr(end_time,1,10) as dt, case when substr(end_time,15,2)<'10' then concat(substr(end_time,12,2),':00') when substr(end_time,15,2) >='10' and substr(end_time,15,2)<'20' then concat(substr(end_time,12,2),':10') when substr(end_time,15,2) >='20' and substr(end_time,15,2)<'30' then concat(substr(end_time,12,2),':20') when substr(end_time,15,2) >='30' and substr(end_time,15,2)<'40' then concat(substr(end_time,12,2),':30') when substr(end_time,15,2) >='40' and substr(end_time,15,2)<'50' then concat(substr(end_time,12,2),':40') when substr(end_time,15,2) >='50' and substr(end_time,15,2)<'60' then concat(substr(end_time,12,2),':50') END as hhmm, walk_step, calorie, longitude, latitude
FROM exercise_mission where id='yura' and substr(end_time,1,10) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') group by substr(end_time,1,10) , case when substr(end_time,15,2)<'10' then concat(substr(end_time,12,2),':00') when substr(end_time,15,2) >='10' and substr(end_time,15,2)<'20' then concat(substr(end_time,12,2),':10') when substr(end_time,15,2) >='20' and substr(end_time,15,2)<'30' then concat(substr(end_time,12,2),':20') when substr(end_time,15,2) >='30' and substr(end_time,15,2)<'40' then concat(substr(end_time,12,2),':30') when substr(end_time,15,2) >='40' and substr(end_time,15,2)<'50' then concat(substr(end_time,12,2),':40') when substr(end_time,15,2) >='50' and substr(end_time,15,2)<'60' then concat(substr(end_time,12,2),':50') END, walk_step, calorie, longitude, latitude order by dt, hhmm
select walk_goal from my_exercise where id=#{id} group by walk_goal

select SUM(walk_step) as walk_steps, round(sum(calorie), 0) as calorie from exercise_mission where id=#{id} and END_TIME BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:SS') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE +1, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select sum(walk_step) as walk_steps from exercise_mission where substr(end_time,6,2) = to_char(sysdate, 'MM') and id=#{id}
select round(sum(walk_step)/count(distinct substr(end_time,1,10)),0) as avg_walk from exercise_mission where substr(end_time,6,2) = to_char(sysdate, 'MM') and id =#{id} group by substr(end_time,1,7)
select SUM(walk_step) as walk_step, to_char(substr(end_time, 1, 10)) as time from exercise_mission where id=#{id} and END_TIME < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') group by substr(end_time, 1, 10)
